quiz.text: Find the age of Sharad 6 years ago from now such that his present age is a multiple of 9 and greater than 36 years. Note: ages of all the persons mentioned are integers.   Statement l: 4 years hence from now, the ratio of the ages of Nikhil and Abhinav will be 7:9, respectively. Also, 2 years ago from now the ratio of their ages was 11:15, respectively.   Statement II: Sum of present ages of Sharad and Neerav is equal to the sum of the present ages of Nikhil and Abhinav.   Statement III: Sharad is elder than Neerav and Neerav's present age is more than 10 years.
options: The data in statements I and Il together are necessary to answer the question while the data in statement III alone is not sufficient to answer the question.
The data in statements II and III together are necessary to answer the question while the data in statement I alone is not sufficient to answer the question.
The data in statements I and III together are necessary to answer the question while the data in statement Il alone is not sufficient to answer the question.
The data either in statement I and statement Il together or in statements I and III together are necessary to answer the question.
The data in all three statements together are necessary to answer the question.

Both A and C

quiz.text: What is the funding pattern (centre : state) under 'Paramparagat Krishi Vikas Yojana (PKVY)' for non-Himalayan states?
options: 50:50
60:40
70:30
40:60
90:10

quiz.text: 'Waste to Energy' programme is being implemented by which of the following ministries?
options: Ministry of Rural Development
Ministry of New and Renewable Energy
Ministry of Agriculture and Farmers’ Welfare
Ministry of Co-operation
Ministry of Electronics and Information Technology

quiz.text:
Beneficiaries under Pradhan Mantri Jan Arogya Yojana (PM-JAY) are selected on the basis of latest Socio-Economic Caste Census (SECC) data covering both rural and urban. Which of the following categories of people are excluded from the ambit of PM-JAY?

A. Households having motorized 2/3/4 wheeler.

B. Households having Kisan Credit Card with credit limit upto Rs. 25,000

C. Households owning more than 2.5 acres of irrigated land
options: A and B
B and C
A and C
A, B and C
None of the above

quiz.text:
Who among the following is/are not eligible under the Pradhan Mantri Matru Vandana Yojana (PMMVY)?

A. Geeta Devi, an ASHA worker in second trimester of pregnancy

B. Bhuri Bai, a tribal woman expecting her first child

C. Reena Malhotra, working as HR manager at ONGC Ltd.
options: Only A
Only B
Only C
A and C
A and B

quiz.text: The Cabinet Committee on Economic Affairs (CCEA) has approved "Broadcasting Information and Network Development" (BIND) scheme for Doordarshan (DD) and All India Radio (AIR), in a boost to public sector broadcasting in the country. What is the duration of this scheme?
options: Up to 2025-26
Up to 2026-27
Up to 2024-25
Up to 2027-28
None of the above

quiz.text:
Which of the following statements is/are correct with respect to Mahatma Gandhi National Rural Employment Guarantee Scheme (MGNREGS)?

A. Work should be provided with 5 km radius of the village.

B. A 75:25 wage and material ratio is to be maintained.

C. Unemployment allowance will be provided in case employment is not provided within fourteen days.
options: Only A
A and C
B and C
A, B and C
A and B
